sentences.english: She stopped fitting me so closely and seemed offish .
sentences.chinese: 她不再那麼緊貼着我，顯得若即若離。

sentences.english: And some credit-card companies, albeit inadvertently, are still processing these transactions.
sentences.chinese: 有些信用卡公司仍若即若離地處理着網上賭博交易。
